feed.title: A Method for Computing Merkle Roots of Annotated Binary Trees

entry.title: A Method for Computing Merkle Roots of Annotated Binary Trees
entry.summary: In a May 22, 2017 email chain on the Bitcoin-Dev mailing list, Russell O'Connor asked for clarification on the math operations used in a Merkle root calculation. Specifically, he queried about the symbols "⋅" and "×." Peter Todd responded to the email. No further context was provided.
